The study compare two group , one group treat usual physical therapy pre-treatment education group also receive pre-treatment . Patients follow 6 week 3 month . Physical therapy care leave discretion physical therapist conjunction patient . Outcomes include pain disability , patient attitude believe ( pain catastrophizing , fear avoidance behavior ) . The overall hypothesis additional educational treatment may address improve pain , disability fear .
